dialogue.introduction: I'm Amagi, an Unryuu-class Carrier! Admiral, this time Amagi can play an active role!
dialogue.library_intro: I'm Amagi, 2nd Carrier of the Unryuu Class. My construction following the Rapid Naval Armaments Supplement Program. Even though I couldn't join the Mobile Striking Force, I did my best in the air raid at Kure Naval base.
dialogue.secretary2: What? Commencing anti-aircraft defense! Huh? Admiral? Um...well...
dialogue.secretary3: Admiral, what's wrong with Amagi's hangar? 'Checking the condition of the aircraft'...? Really?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Hakodate... I wonder...? That's such a familiar name... Maybe it's just me...? Ah, Admiral! Did you call for me? Amagi will give her best!
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral, thank you for giving Amagi these wonderful aircraft... And for including me in the main force. Really, thank you very much!... I'm full of gratitude.
dialogue.wedding: Admiral, did you call for Amagi? Huh? It's for Amagi? Then, I will accept it, Admiral. Th-thank you. I will treasure it.
dialogue.show_players_score: Reports are important, right, Admiral? Amagi thinks so, too.
dialogue.equipment1: Shall we reinforce my anti-aircraft guns?
dialogue.equipment2: Amagi is thankful for the new aircraft. Thank you very much.
dialogue.supply: Thank you, for all these precious fuel & aircraft.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: It's not a serious wound but...thanks, Admiral.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: I'm sorry. I'm going to take a lot of time in the bath. I'm truly... sorry.
dialogue.ship_construction: Looks like a new ship has joined the fleet.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet has returned. Good work everyone.
dialogue.air_battle: Reppuu... These dazzling wings.. Oh, whoops, I'm smitten with my own planes.
dialogue.night_battle: What... A pursuit attack? Then... I'll do my best.
dialogue.mvp: Fuu... Amagi is happy with the result of the battle! Amagi can do it, as long as I give my best effort!
dialogue.minor_damaged1: I got bombed!? Commence emergency procedures!
dialogue.minor_damaged2: Hurry up with the flood control! I-I'm fine!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Uwa...I've been hit. It's impossible to launch planes now.
dialogue.sunk: Even though...Amagi is sinking...Amagi still has this strange feeling...This time, I did my best...right...?
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Admiral, today is a important day right? Amagi is honored to be with you! Fufu, I'm happy.
dialogue.christmas_2015: Merry Christmas, Admiral. Nighttime scenery at Hakodate and Kure should've be pretty in this season.
dialogue.new_year_2016: Admiral, Happy New Year to you! I am honored to be spending a new year together!

hourly.0000: Admiral! The day has changed! Today, Amagi will announce the hourlies! Yes, don't worry! I'll do my best!
hourly.0100: 01:00. Admiral... The fleet is quiet tonight!
hourly.0200: 02:00. It's... Midnight... 'Are you scared'? No... I... am... not...? Admiral...? Where are you...? Hyaa!?
hourly.0300: 03:00. Admiral? Um? Can you stop toying with me? Amagi was really surprised... It's not like I was scared...
hourly.0400: 04:00. Admiral? It's very sleepy at this time... Ufu! I'm doing my best!
hourly.0500: 05:00. It's dawn now... Shall we prepare for the reveille?
hourly.0600: 06:00. Commencing reveille! It's morning! Let us give our best today, too!
hourly.0700: 07:00. Admiral! I'm sorry for making such a simple dish but... breakfast is here! Today the soup for miso is...
hourly.0800: 08:00. Admiral? Did Amagi's breakfast match your taste? Ah... great... I'll be cleaning now... Thanks...
hourly.0900: 09:00. Admiral! It's about time we do some battles. What shall we pick for the main fleet?
hourly.1000: 10:00. That's right... I'm happy I get to equip aircraft! They're beautiful... aircraft that is.
hourly.1100: 11:00. It's about time for lunch, right? What do you want, Admiral...? I wonder what I should make...
hourly.1200: 12:00. It's noon, now! Admiral, I tried making Japanese-style curry for lunch! Please eat up, I still have a lot left.
hourly.1300: 13:00. My curry was good, too, right? Of course, the soup & the potato starch were on point, as well.
hourly.1400: 14:00. Ah... Unryuu-neesama! How are you, today? You're getting more beautiful these days... Amagi want to be like you, too!
hourly.1500: 15:00. Admiral, do you want some sweets? I've ordered some Kudzu starch cake from Mamiya! Let us dig in!
hourly.1600: 16:00. Admiral, if Amagi trains hard, can Amagi match Hiryuu & Souryuu? Huh? Really...? Then, Amagi will do her best!
hourly.1700: 17:00. Admiral, the sunset was beautiful, right...? Um... Amagi is also... Noooo, what am I saying... Let's go back... Yes...
hourly.1800: 18:00. Admiral, shall Amagi prepare your dinner? Amagi will show you her culinary skills! Please wait!
hourly.1900: 19:00. Amagi tried a Western-style dinner! It's cutlet & corn soup, today.
hourly.2000: 20:00. Hah? 'Cutlet is different from tonkatsu'? Huh? 'How'? Well, first off... It's...
hourly.2100: 21:00. Admiral! Yeah... About our sister Katsuragi? Yes, I believe we will meet again, & I want to form a carrier division with her.
hourly.2200: 22:00. It's quiet at night... Well, looks like it's not... shall Amagi go & make it quiet?
hourly.2300: 23:00. Admiral, thanks for your hard work today. Please have some sleep.
